Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Increases the maximum qualifying income for the senior citizen homeowner's exemption and the disabled homeowner's exemption
Summary: Increases the maximum qualifying income for the senior citizen homeowner's exemption and the disabled homeowner's exemption to $70,000 in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum qualifying income for the senior citizen homeowner's exemption and the disabled homeowner's exemption
